about_the_game:
Venture into a bizarre kingdom plagued with great evil and dry humor. Explore a vibrant open world and fight through a campaign of crazy characters and wild quests to save the world.

KEY FEATURES

Take on a variety of challenges

The Odd Kingdom is constantly changing, and you must adapt to each quest you take on. Switch to first-person to scale mountains with a grappling hook, fine-tune your movement to navigate past a dungeon’s traps, or even get a top-down perspective to cook in a restaurant.


Explore a lore (and comedy)-rich world

With each place you discover and person you meet, you’ll learn more about the mysterious past of the Odd Kingdom. Each interaction you have will bring you new insights, and laughs.


Customize your combat

From Barbecue Masters to Math Teachers, Pastry Lords to Unicorns, every class has a unique gimmick that changes the way you play. And with a wide-range of weapons to choose from, each with a unique ability, your fighting style can take on any shape.


Be a completionist—well, if you WANT to be…

The “notebook” is your most trusted tool. As you discover more about the Kingdom and the people within it, your notebook will fill up with more and more lore about the world you’re trying to save. Explore every inch of the Kingdom to light “braziers,” which doll out boones of trivia, history, and achievements for each one you find.
